hardcover.config.tooltip.alternative-rec: Displays the resulting item instead of the recipe and a tooltip shows the material list
hardcover.config.tooltip.dark-mode: VanillaTweaks-based dark mode for the tweaked texture of the alternative recipe button
hardcover.config.tooltip.ungroup-recipes: Ungroup any grouped recipes into single recipes
hardcover.config.tooltip.recipe-book: Toggles the recipe book button in supported screens
hardcover.config.tooltip.unlock-all-reci: Unlock all recipes when a player enters a world
hardcover.config.tooltip.bounce: Toggles the subtle bounce effect seen when new recipes are added
hardcover.config.tooltip.circular-scroll: Enables circular scrolling when using the next and previous buttons
hardcover.config.tooltip.centered-invent: Centers the inventory and prevents it from moving when the recipe book is opened
hardcover.config.tooltip.mouse-wheel-scr: Enables mouse wheel scrolling within the recipe book
hardcover.config.experimental-tooltip: Uses an experimental tooltip to show the recipe
